original_title: Bob the Builder: Yes We Can!
overview: Bob the Farmer: Bob volunteers to look after the farm for Farmer Pickeles, but taking care of the farm animals is not so easy! It seems Bob is a better builder than he is a farmer! Where's Muck?: Muck can't wait to dig into a muddy job helping Bob repair a riverbank! But when Bob and the machines are covered in mud, why is Muck not messy? Roley's Important Job: When Roley tags along on a job, he rolls away when he finds he's not needed. Will Roley find a way to contribute to the celebration when the job is done? Travis's Busy Day: Travis is eager to repair the barn after a storm, but Farmer Pickles asks Bob to help instead. Will Travis find another way to help? Or will he create more problems? Lofty the Artist: Lofty wants to be an artist and help redecorate, but painting is harder than it looks! Just when it seems Lofty has ruined the job, he finds a way to get it done!
title: Bob the Builder: Yes We Can!
